name: DLN
description: Experience native cross-chain trading with deep liquidity, advanced limit orders, and lightning-fast execution. Powered by deBridge
chains_supported: Ethereum, Arbitrum, Base, Optimism, Polygon PoS, Avalanche...
auction_design_details: The first accepted solver bid automatically wins the auction irrespective of whether another bid comes in at roughly the same time with a better price or outcome for the user
auction_openness_details: Auctions occur off chain and no data around composion or basis for which solver won the right to fill the auction is published
solver_diversity_details: Protocol acts as it's own solver and doesn't allow for permissionless participation
censorship_resistance_details: No protocol features or mechanisms are in place to ensure bids are accepted and fulfilled
solver_failure_resistance_details: If no solvers are available there is no way to fulfil the operation and no way for the user to get their funds back on the source chain
